mapper.select: SELECT B.BOOK_NO , B.MEMBER_NO , M.NAME as memberName , B.BOOK_PLACE , TO_CHAR(B.START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS START_DATE , TO_CHAR(B.END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS END_DATE , B.BOOK_PURPOSE , TO_CHAR(B.BOOK_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS BOOK_DATE , TO_CHAR(B.UPDATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS UPDATE_DATE , TO_CHAR(B.CANCEL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS CANCEL_DATE FROM BOOK B JOIN MEMBER M ON B.MEMBER_NO = M.NO WHERE CANCEL_DATE IS NULL ORDER BY BOOK_NO DESC

choose.when:
SELECT B.BOOK_NO , B.MEMBER_NO , M.NAME as memberName , B.BOOK_PLACE , TO_CHAR(B.START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS START_DATE , TO_CHAR(B.END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS END_DATE , B.BOOK_PURPOSE , TO_CHAR(B.BOOK_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS BOOK_DATE , TO_CHAR(B.UPDATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS UPDATE_DATE , TO_CHAR(B.CANCEL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS CANCEL_DATE FROM BOOK B JOIN MEMBER M ON B.MEMBER_NO = M.NO WHERE CANCEL_DATE IS NULL
AND B.START_DATE >= #{startDate} AND B.END_DATE <= #{endDate}
AND M.NAME LIKE '%' || #{memberName} || '%' -- 예약자명으로 필터링
ORDER BY B.BOOK_NO DESC
choose.otherwise: SELECT B.BOOK_NO , B.MEMBER_NO , M.NAME as memberName , B.BOOK_PLACE , TO_CHAR(B.START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS START_DATE , TO_CHAR(B.END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS END_DATE , B.BOOK_PURPOSE , TO_CHAR(B.BOOK_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS BOOK_DATE , TO_CHAR(B.UPDATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS UPDATE_DATE , TO_CHAR(B.CANCEL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS CANCEL_DATE FROM BOOK B JOIN MEMBER M ON B.MEMBER_NO = M.NO WHERE B.CANCEL_DATE IS NULL ORDER BY B.BOOK_NO DESC

mapper.select: SELECT BOOK_NO , MEMBER_NO , BOOK_PLACE , START_DATE , END_DATE , BOOK_PURPOSE , BOOK_DATE , UPDATE_DATE , CANCEL_DATE FROM BOOK WHERE BOOK_NO = #{bookNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE BOOK SET CANCEL_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE BOOK_NO = #{bookNo}
